categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: "Marcie" was the nickname given to a blue-bladed lightsaber by Jedi Knight Rissa Mano. During the heat of a battle while on a mission to Hissrich, Mano briefly lent Marcie to Mace Windu, allowing him to use it along with his own lightsaber to take down a harvester.
